forum.content:
Hey, everyone.
I found a lot of people looking for partners to practice their English.

Why don't we chat together in English?

Let's start it!
Step 1, name your favorite series or movies
Step 2, say the quotes you like most in that films
Step 3, say whatever you want, just in English

I go first.😇
1, Breaking Bad
2, I am the one who knocks💥💥🎅
3, knock knock~it's your turn
forum.title: Learning from the quotes
